testcase.classname: User could register with valid data
testcase.name: user enter valid data to register

testcase.classname: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.name: user enter valid email and password

testcase.classname: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user click on login button............................................passed When user login with "invalidtest@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...............passed And click enter key.........................................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.name: user select or switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: When user select "Euro".....................................................passed Then Verify Euro is shown in four product displayed in the home page........passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.name: user is haver and select category
testcase.system-out: When user haver on computer category........................................passed And after hovering, you need to select random one of the three sub categories like Desktops.passed Then Assert that the sub-category title is (equal or contains) the one you get it while selecting random sub-category.passed

testcase.classname: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.name: user could search using product name
testcase.system-out: Given click on search field to insert something inside......................passed When search for any product like "Apple"....................................passed Then url contains "nopCommerce demo store. Search"..........................passed And search shows relevant results "Apple"...................................passed
